readable.title: 3208999896_dab42dc40b
readable.content: A bride , a groom , 3 guys , and 3 women . A bride and groom are the center of this picture , with three bridesmaids in red dresses to the left and groomsmen to the right . A couple taking a wedding photo with their wedding party . A formal wedding party poses smiling for a wedding photo in a church . The wedding party is posing for a picture in front of the church alter .
